values:
Okay I got back from Tennessee with Ashley and Celena Sunday. I have never been happier to be in my own bed. I don't use my bed but to lay on it but hey! Thats just as good right? NOW IT IS!
anyways... In Tennessee 90% of the time we went swimming in the lake. I LOVED IT! I made them go swimming with me... Alot. MWAHAHAHAHAHA! We went to church like atleast 5 times, (I didn't have a problem with that) and ... ate... ALOT. EVERY night we stayed alnight on the houseboat and had a wonner roast/ marshmellow roast. It was nice. I had to watch The Phantom Of The Opera 14 times. 
MOVING ON... Now i'm back so thats all that counts. But on days as hot as yesturday... I wish the lake was next door. *sighes* 
Wel I'm leaving. 
CHOW!

TADA! Another HAM-HAM! No one would make another ham-ham named Juliet so I did./ HAHA! Now I have a Romeo and a Juliet. Just like I did before they died for... no reason at all... -shifty eyes-

This is my ham-ham Romeo. I had a hamster by the name Romeo once... But he got in a fight with my other hamster and they had a gang bang and killed him. I MISS HIM! So I killed the rest of them (All 24 or 26 of them!) THIS IS MY HAM-HAM! (Now someone make a ham ham by the name of Juliet so it can be Romeo's lover) CHOW!

Ok everyone. It has been FOREVER since I wrote on this LJ thing.
We have six more school days left of school. HOW SWEET! I can't wait for the summer. My summer sounds booked but its not when I look at the calender. I AM GOING TO JROTC CAMP! How freaking sweet. Going to Kings Island on my Y-G trip and oh yeah, Marching band. It starts like 2 weeks befor school starts or more. SO THATS WHY MY SUMMER SEEMED BOOOKED! 
                                        Moving on...
I wreaked today. Wasn't bad but I had a cuncution aparently. I didn't know I did. I didn't feel it till I woke-up laying in the middle of the road with cars behind me. LoL. Okay here is how it went. Today when I got home from school I laid down and took a nap till 730. I woke-up and asked Ernie would he go rollerblading with me. He was like, *sure. We could use it!* So we went rollerblading and I noticed my right blade was REALLY lose at the bottem and WAY to tight at the top. I was like well effe. It will live till I get home. So Ernie got tired and desided to turn around. WEELLLLL... I keep going and there was this BIIIIIGGGGGGGGG hill. I skated up it till my sweat came from my teeth. (ALOT of sweating) When I got at the top of the hill I turned around and flew down the hill on my skates. Ernie was just alittle ways infront of me and there was a car behind me. Ernie asked me to stop and wait for him so (if you have ever been to my house, there is a big blue house above mine) I started slowing down. As I started slowing down I didn't see any rocks so I went right (with the bad blade. STUPID BLADE) and started tripping. I couldn't keep my balence so I feel in the road and rolled over into the ditch. Ernie said I past out. He said he tried to wake me up and trash but I wouldn't. He said people stopped and asked did I need help and was I okay but I didn't answer and he told them to go on. He said until Madison got there I was out of it. I had to clue what I was saying or anything (Like I remember. I didn't even know ppl stopped) When I got home my head was hurting REALLY bad. I started rubbing my head and felt this big pump knot. I was like *holy crap* I tried to go to sleep. But my mamaw keep hitting me. She said *NOOOO. You will die* I was like *I DON'T CARE! I'M SLEEPH!* I felt this sharp pain in my hip and in my neck. When my mom got home she took me to the hospital. When I was in the car on the way to the hospital I was looking over myself and notcied millions of cuts on my leg and my back went to crap. We got at the hospital at 949pm and got out at 126am. The dr said I can't do any activitys that I could get bumped on the head for two weeks, or I could go into ceisiers. (how ever you spell it)Well.. Thats my story so I am leaving. 
                         *kiss-kiss*
                       Much love to ya!
                                                            Love Always,
                                                              Ariel Leigh 
                                                            Brown

ITS SOOOO COOL! I feel like a little 3 yr old again because I haven't been grounded since... like the 5th grade. WEEE! Sooo young! Anyways... I;'m still grounded but ah. We don't school until monday so i guess its okay or me to be on here. I don't really care. Well.. I'm leaving now. GROUND-EJ RULES!

Well looks like my life is making atleast ALMOST half abit of sense now. (Only 43% out of 100%... Thats a F but it is better than 0% right?)Anyways it seems alot of my friends are having better luck than some of the others... Not saying any names... ANYWAYS... (I'm GONNA USE YOUR NICKNAME IF YOU HAVE ONE AROUND ME OR YOUR PARENTS GAVE YOU ONE... Jessica... LoL)

Blonde: I LOVE YOU ASHLEY and I hope your life starts to get on the track you want it to but it is nearly impossible but pray and God can do anything you ask of him. But first you don't question his existence. *KISS-KISS* MUCH LOVE BLONDIE!

Cenea: I love you and I hope one day we will know what we are, (boy or girl) LoL. Anyways... That would help us with our lives MUCH better! (Like 99.99% of our lives). I LOVE YOU KIDO!

Mighty Midget: I'm REALLY glad you and Brandon got together. It is weird of me to say but I really think you and my brother look tight together. I LOVE YOU SOOOOOOOOO MUCH!

Pooh: LoL. I said I would start calling you this name because your mom did. Hope we can get together some time another and not for dudes to try bring us home with them. LoL. That was funneh. SUCH A HICK. LoL. I hope you and Jordan are doing REALLY good. LOVE YOU!

Princess or Mr. Big poppa: I LOVE YOU SOOO MUCH and I hope your wholeplans go smoth as silk. It would be nice if you were happy every now and then. I'm glad I can make you happy and dance through your house when I can. LoL. Love you SOOOO much again. *kiss-kiss* CHOW!

Thats it of the people that was doing okay or whatever. Thats all I needed to say. LoL. If you don't like me... BITE ME! Tee-Hee! :D 
                               ~CHOW!~

Okay, I'm telling you. The first night I did sleep FINALLY... IT WAS HORRIBLE. I had this sucky dream that this guy asked me to prom (Example name: Jordan) and I said *sure. I will go!* Well... After that we were suppose to go out to eat but we didn't. We went to his place and he jerked me out of his car, then my friend sorta guy (Example name: Chris) drove by and noticed i was being drug in. Well Chris stopped then ran into Jordan's house. When Chris walked in he saw Jordan holding a gun to my head. Chris jumped in trying to get the gun away from Jordan and he shot Chris. After he shot him he took a knife out and stabbed him.  
        Yeah it was wierd and it sucked. My brother said it just means that I am scared to lose *Chris* and someone has asked me out to prom(They have) and I said yes.  
        Anyways... I don't care but F man. I HATE HAVING THIS DREAM FOR 3 NIGHTS IN A ROW. I HATE IT SO BAD. Well... Maybe it is time for bed so... *kiss-kiss* Much love to you all! 
                               CHOW!!!

I don't get it. No one will comment on anything of mine. Why not? Gerr... PLEASE DO! I want comments. I only have 2 and it is between me and someone. -not saying names- ! OH YEAH! Another thing I don't get. My friend LOVES my brother and she sorta scarred to talk to him. I WANT THEM TO TALK! They would look so cute. I'm not gonna say any names but EVERYONE almost knows who she is. He said he would ask her out if she would copme talk to him 1st and now I'm trying to get her to talk to him 1st. GERRR... Everyone thinks they would look cute and so do I! -Sad to say I FINALLY thin someone looks good with my brother
. Well... I'm sleepy so I'm going to bed. *kiss kiss* Much love! Ariel

I really have nothing to say AGAIN. But it's a sunday night and Ashley -aka. Blonde- is here also. I guess I'm about to watch a movie or something to keep me from bored'om. I really hate all these people that keeps writing me and the little -DING- sound keeps going off. GERRR. I hate it. Well... Uhmm... Of ocurse I'm running outta things to say AGAIN. I'm listen to this STUPID STUPID song now. G O. I HATE IT. They over play it WAYYYYY to much on the radio. ((The reason is you)) Well... Since I have nothing else to do or anything else to talk about, I'm leaving. *kiss-kiss* Love to ya all! UH-BUH-BYE!

Okay... I have been home fore 4days now not getting outta the house. I think I'm gonna die if I odn't get out sometime another. I don't care where I go, not even to my grandmothers (MILLIONS OF KIDS), as long as I GET OUT. I'm SO feed up of hearing Christen cry over the TV remote, Ernie cry over the food channel, Brandon cry over when he can go get his hair done again, my mom cry over my dad snoring to loud and my dad crying over how much the house needs cleaned and my mom snorring. JUST SHUT UP!!! I'm so tired of it. It's bothering worse than that stupid darkness video. Maybe I should cry over who hates me, what TV show to watch, when to get my hair done, and over Ernie always snorring. They will get feed up with it right? THEY SHOULD. I can't stand myself. I don't see how ANYONE stands me. Don't I bother you? Come on... BRUTAL TRUTH TIME!!! Tell me.  ~~~Anyways...~~~ Now I'm sorta sad because I fould out what chick was talking about me and writing trash and Hylton's page about me. You would never believe it and not only that. I think it's mean to say things about people when you are SUPPOSE to be their friend. ~Thinks~ SLUT* I can't believe her. She makes me feel like SO bad now. You know what? I don't wanna tell you all about my suckish life anymore. So... *DIE DIE* Hate to you ho. B.I.H. and to those who never talks about me, *kiss-kiss* Much love to ya! LA. Ariel

So... I just found out my friends like to talk about me. Well... Not totally good. But hey I like to hear the brutal truth. It's SO about time for someone to tell me. LoL. Well If you all can talk about me, SO CAN I. It's wrong of me to but hey. What can I say. I'm not a very friendly person. 

Hylton: You know what? You can change your posts on this live trash. PLEASE do. PLEASE. It's not like I'm afraid to hear that trash, but if it gets to *B-F* our relationship could be like... SO over. I don't want it. I love him like... ALOT, but like I said I've had other things on my mind. Don't you when you talk to Jordan? PLEASE change it and don't use names on my comment thing and like I said. If you want to talk about me, talk about me to my face, not to these people that reads L.J.'s. If you talk about me behind my back, thats how I lose like 99.9% of my friends that I HAVE lost.

Tim Hall: Hey princess! LoL. I'm sorry I just think it is so cute to say princess to a guy. Its like a oxy moron or something. LoL. Anyways. Love you and hope to see your prblems will work out.

Sara: Yeah for once I'm on Hylton's side. You have to find someone else or your never going to get over poor Shawn. I have to agree Ashley W. done you wrong but, didn't Shawn also? I love you though. Your like one of my best friends. LoL. I love you though doll.

Candice: I LOVE YOU SOOOOOOOOO MUCH. Don't let some slut get to you and some little 10 year old looking boy hurt your feelings. That ho has a boyfriend and she forgets about him when another bot comes around??? WTF? She don't love him than. She don't love no one. Thats what a ho is. DUDE... But you can't let this get to her. NONE of this trash. I love her too. She is one on my lezbo's but I don't like some of her ways. Thank for making my page tight! 

Tackett: Yeah... I'm with Hylton again. You REALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLY need to stop talking about Bryan and Jesse and Justin. I'm SO tired of hearing their names. It's killing me. Everytime I hear there names I wanna run to you and cut off your head even though you aren't the one saying there names. Thats how annoyed I am. It's getting bad. Like REALLY bad. Atleast when your around me, don't talk about them unless it's been like.... 65790678975467546544 years. PLEASE? I love you though.... STILL.

Ashley J: I LOVE YOU SOOOOOOOOO MUCH TOO! Your like the best friend a girl could ask for. Cheer me up when I'm down, give me your shoulder when I need one, and always, ALWAYS, helps bring me back up when I feel like nothing else could go wrong and just wanna go to a corner and kill myself. I love this much. <-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------> And then alot more. Thank you.

Celena: Your just like Ashley but... No... Your not. I changed my mind. You put me downer when I'm the downest I could get and when I'm the happiest I can get, you make me happier. Don't know how you do it, but LoL. I love it. You make me more down but I laugh at it. LoL. Then it like starts over form the happiest I could EVER get whenI am the downest person on the face of the earth. LoL. I love you. Your so dumb. Your one of my fourths of a brain. LoL. Much love to you. 

Madison: You need a g-f bad. A g-f that loves you ALOT and won't treat you like you should die. Anyways, Lets go fourwheeler riding again sometime another. I have a blast everytime I'm with you and so does Danilla. I you all so much.

Danilla: I'm going to miss you so much when you go back to Brazil. Make sure you stay in touch with me. Much MUCH love to you. 

Cindy: Black ISN'T a bad color. People are gay and don't know what they are talking about. They all need to die or something. LoL. I am going to miss you SO bad. DON'T LEAVE ME HERE. I love you. 
Danny: Hey girlly! I love you. Your pretty cool to be Ashleys bestfriend. LoL. ((Sorry Ash))Thank for letting me borrow the books. Love to you.

Stephine: I love you little one but man, your getting annoying when all you say to me is mostly your brother hates me, and all you wanna talk about is Peanut. It's getting really annoying. So please. Cut the trash.

Julie: I love you! Your my favorite! Member that forever! Oh yeah... You need to find a boyfriend. Make that faggot feel like trash... *NASTY* Just THINKING about such a loser make me sick. *cough cough* For real. LoL.

Sarah McCoy: I love you. Your pretty cool. Even though your like one of my best lezbo's ***Shhhhhhhhhhhhhhh*** Don't tell my wife, I LOVE YOU ALOT! 

Ashley Little: Your my wife... I would never cheat on you. LoL. Don't read Sarahs or Julies post... I'M NOT LEAVING YOU. EVER.

Ben: Like I said. I odn't hate her. I PROMISE. I just don't like some of her ways. I don't like ALOT of my friends ways but hey... I still love them. She don't like me that well, but ahhh... I'll get over it.

Trevin: Glad to see you and Mel got hooked up. I love you Trevy.

Well... Here I am sitting at home (of course), getting fat (OF COURSE), eatting (whatelse is there to do). Anyways I have just desided that I am making a cure for boredom. It will the BEST cure in the world. Better than the cure for illnesses or the cure for rapers. I promise it will be the best. I will start on it... One day. Maybe not today... Maybe not tomarrow... and maybe not the day after tomarrow, but one day. MAYBE NOT EVEN THIS LIFE TIME! (<<<I like that idea<<<!) 
Moving on...
Finally we go back to school tomarrow. It feels like I have been trapped here FOREVER and it has only been 3 days. Yeah think thats bad. You should see me in the summers. (NASTY) Can't stand me. I should know! Well... Not I really have anything important to say so if you want to stop reading my trash... Its more than okay. Not like I will come and shot you dead or anything... (Not right yet anyways). *Laughs evil* Man... I need a life. Like really bad.
Well... If you haven't stopped reading my trash yet you should now because your just wasting your time reading about my boring life that I don't have. You wanna hear my boring life? Good! Your going to because I can do whatever I want since this is my page thing and your just a reader and well, I'm running outta things to say. 
Wake up
